description: Episode of Series "One Man". Through his inspired leadership, the Rev. Sullivan has been able to redeem and transform thousands of school dropouts and potential criminals. Describes the Opportunities Industrialisation Centre which he organised in order to train people of the ghetto to become skilled workers. Narrated by Barry Sullivan.
